body_html:
@jmchen-g
yes.

It seems that the ps can not find the checkpoint file.

I guess when the chief worker reload the model , the worker notify the ps to reload paramter value from the same checkpoint dir .

Is that means the chief worker and ps must in the same machine ???

body:
@jmchen-g 
yes.

It seems that the ps can not find the checkpoint file.

I guess when the chief worker reload the model , the worker notify the ps to reload paramter value from the same checkpoint dir .

Is that means the chief worker and ps must in the same machine ???
